# harness_platform_infra_provider_versions (Data Source)

Data source for listing Terraform/OpenTofu Provider Versions from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_provider_versions" "aws_versions" {
  account = "your-account-id"
  type    = "aws"
}

output "all_aws_versions" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider_versions.aws_versions.versions
}

# Filter to get only versions supporting protocol 6.0
locals {
  v6_compatible_versions = [
    for v in data.harness_platform_infra_provider_versions.aws_versions.versions : v
    if contains(v.protocols, "6.0")
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `account` (String) Account identifier.
- `type` (String) Provider type (e.g., aws, azurerm, google).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `versions` (List of Object) List of provider versions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `platforms` (List of Object) Supported platforms. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedobjatt--versions--platforms))
- `protocols` (List of String) Supported Terraform protocol versions.
- `version` (String) Version number.

<a id="nestedobjatt--versions--platforms"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions.platforms`

Read-Only:

- `arch` (String) Architecture.
- `os` (String) Operating system.
